Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to abatement of taxation for alterations and improvements to certain multiple dwellings
Items.MatterName: Abatement of taxation for alterations and improvements to certain multiple dwellings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of housing preservation and development to report on the disposition of city property for affordable housing development
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of housing preservation and development to report on the disposition of city property for affordable housing development

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a pilot program to convert existing basement or cellar apartments to habitable dwelling units
Items.MatterName: A pilot program to convert existing basement or cellar apartments to habitable dwelling units.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the building code of the city of New York and the New York city fire code, in relation to construction of ancillary dwelling units
